data.text: @ktfoleyotr @Say_Dyslexia @AmberSchmidtke How are they gonna learn ? When will they have the chance in life you got ? They have mechanically more chance of die because you drunk drive, or accident at the park ? Have you banned alcohol? Will you bubble wrap them at the park ? Careful suffocating is a real risk!

@ktfoleyotr @Say_Dyslexia @AmberSchmidtke You willing as parents have decided to remove the source of the social and teaching life learnings. For one simple reason fear. We've been in this for 3 years, half of the deaths are with co-morbidities, you are suppressing all that for your kids because they could die? /

@ktfoleyotr @Say_Dyslexia @AmberSchmidtke The difference is that Flu is only tracked in a less stringent manner. So yes 30 in 3 years not 2. Because 2019-2020 was already impacted by flu. (We had no death in 2020-2021, because they probably died of Covid). And no school do not close for flu for such duration. /
@4joiedevivre @AmberSchmidtke This chart = 31 dead kids in GA due to COVID-19. 31 dead kids.
@AmberSchmidtke And this is why my boys will continue to mask up at school,  despite teachers telling them masks are optional 😔

@Akakery @RKempNewsDaily @AmberSchmidtke @ClaytonCountyGA Asking for the continued support of our community for masks until the end of the school year. There are those beyond our community who want to make it an issue. However, we always have made decisions with the best interest our children and community in mind. This is no different.
@RKempNewsDaily @AmberSchmidtke @ClaytonCountyGA Thankfully @MorceaseBeasley has decided to keep the mask mandate through the rest of the school year.
